originalText.text: I am an NYU employee/professor and I wish I had never joined this credit union. Honestly, if you can join any other credit union or USAA do that instead. They are heartless, the office runs poorly, and everything takes forever to process. Their online interfaces are complete garbage. They have also recently ruined my credit by reporting me for late credit card payments and shutting down my account without even letting me know. They say they want to help you with your mortgage, they don't. When I bought my apartment, I tried to go through them for my mortgage, but their rates were not even remotely competitive. They say they want to help you get out of debt, but they don't. They say they want to help you buy a car, they don't. Every single experience I have had there is horrible. Every time you have a question about something they've done wrong, they have to take it to their CEO, and that usually takes a month. Why does a credit union have to run everything by a CEO. The in person office is even worse than the interface. No one can help you. Everything takes an hour. Don't join. Trust me. They ruin lives.

originalText.text: The staff @ Nyufcu in Mineola are amazing -So helpful. I’ve had interactions with the staff at the city Branch. What I can say is that they all put their members concerns first. I love it here !!

originalText.text:
Staff is really nice and helpful. I opened my account two years ago and I haven’t experienced any issues so far.

Location is very convenient

originalText.text: The NYU FCU is a trustworthy, dependable and professional financial organization. I joined in 2008 with auto-deduction from my payroll. It is convenient and I forget that a percentage of my salary is in a savings account. When I need to withdraw we have options: ATMs, checks or cash at the teller's desk, in my case in the Broadway street's office. I have peace of mind knowing that no crash in the market could wipe out my hard earned money! My money is safe at the NYU Federal Credit Union. I give you five stars, FCU deserves it! Thank you so much!
